result.markdown:
# Simulated Multi-Country Data This website makes use of simulated data. Data come from 30 hypothetical countries. Data contain measures of a few key aspects of parenting[^parenting] or caregiving that have proven salient in the empirical literature on parenting to date. The outcome is `aggression` against other children. ::: {.cell} ::: {#fig-globe2 .cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` Countries of the World ::: ::: :::{.callout-tip collapse="false"} ## Variable Values Most variables in this data set are *dichotomous*, and are coded `0/1` with `0 = "no"` and `1 = "yes"`. More descriptive `no/yes` *value labels* could be added in most statistical packages. ::: :::{.callout-note collapse="true"} ## Download The Data * [R](https://github.com/agrogan1/globalfamilies/raw/main/simulate-data/MICSsimulated.RData) * [Stata](https://github.com/agrogan1/globalfamilies/raw/main/simulate-data/MICSsimulated.dta) * [SPSS](https://github.com/agrogan1/globalfamilies/raw/main/simulate-data/MICSsimulated.sav) * [CSV](https://github.com/agrogan1/globalfamilies/raw/main/simulate-data/MICSsimulated.csv) ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="true" code-summary="Show the code"} load("./simulate-data/MICSsimulated.RData") ``` ::: ## Variables and Variable Labels ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="true" code-summary="Show the code"} labelled::look_for(MICSsimulated) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` pos variable label col_type missing values 1 id id int 0 2 country country int 0 3 GII Gender Inequality Index int 0 4 HDI Human Development Index int 0 5 cd1 spank int 0 6 cd2 beat int 0 7 cd3 shout int 0 8 cd4 explain int 0 9 aggression aggression int 0 ``` ::: ::: [^parenting]: We use the term parenting throughout this site, but are aware that such parenting may come from biological parents, or from other caregivers. ## A Sample Of The Data A sample of the data is given below. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="true" code-summary="Show the code"} head(MICSsimulated) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` id country GII HDI cd1 cd2 cd3 cd4 aggression 1 1 1 20 24 0 0 1 1 1 2 2 1 20 24 0 0 1 1 1 3 3 1 20 24 0 0 1 1 1 4 4 1 20 24 0 0 0 0 1 5 5 1 20 24 1 0 1 1 0 6 6 1 20 24 0 0 1 1 1 ``` ::: :::
